column2: You have for some time now been preparing to give your liege one of Nurgle's gifts but you know you must keep up your appearance as a fake "healer".
You are about to give your liege one of Nurgle's gifts
Blessing of Nurgle be upon you
You has decided to spend your free time on activities that pleases the Dark Gods, now which activity would you like to dedicate yourself to?
Gardener
This path will lead you to devoting yourself to become a Gardener of Nurgle
Engineer
This path will lead you to devote yourself to engineer the best way to give Nurgle's gifts to all
Dark Apothecary
This path will lead you to becoming a Dark Apothecary, so you can give people Nurgle's gifts yourself
Socializer
This path wil lead you to devoting yourself to socializing, spreading the sweet word of the Dark Prince
Seducer
This path will lead you to become a master seducer, may you bring pleasure in the name of the Prince
Hedonist
This path will lead you to devote yourself to become a hedonist the best way to achive constant excess, all in the name of the Prince
Mystic
This path will lead you to becoming a mystic, manipulator of ruinous powers, to use them for your own goals and pleasing mighty Tzeentch
Game Master
This path will lead you to devote yourself to game mastery the best way to stay one step ahead of your opponents, all for the Changer of Ways
Schemer
This path will lead you to devoting yourself to become a schemer, to plot and bring change, all in the name of Tzeentch
Strategist
This path will lead you to devote yourself to become a strategist, to lead armies and smash legions upon legions, all in name of the Blood God
Duelist
This path will lead you to devoting yourself to become a duelist mastering your one on one skill and bringing many skulls for Khorne
Hunter
This path will lead you to become a hunter, tracking and killing your preys, bringing new throphies for mighty Khorne
Gardener
This path will lead you to devoting yourself to become a gardener, planting the seeds of chaos
Hedonist
This path will lead you to devote yourself to become a hedonist, bringing the excess of chaos to the world
Schemer
This path will lead you to devoting yourself to become a schemer, planning the downfall of man and rise of chaos
Strategist
his path will lead you to devote yourself to become a strategist, formulating the best strategies to strengthen chaos
On the other hand, I don't feel like it.
column14: x#Change your mind or something like that, you don't choose a Aspect

column2: You have planted many seeds and reaped many diseases. You have learned quite well about the gifts of great Papa, and now you can give them away.
Rejoice! I bring gifts

Drawing out and planning out, almost like worshiping Tzeentch, you engineer the best ways of sharing the gifts. The cities weak sewer systems, water supplies, and other many means. All used to spread Nurgles touch.
I am the Architect of plagues

Through your medical training and gaining experties, you only realized more how important Papa is. His gifts cure everything, his way share the light and acceptance, only his care can bring through joy to the world.
I am Nurgle's servant, my work is in his name!
Socializing brings such joy, the more focus and practice more you feel like being in the right place. Who would think that just being with people brings such almost excess like emotions.
My silver tongue will please the Prince
With few flirts and bombastic character, you are becoming more and more irresistable. And not to meantion your own way in the bed, people are getting addicted to you!
The pleasure is all mine
With few flirts and bombastic character, you are becoming more and more irresistable. And not to meantion your own way in the bed, people are getting addicted to you!
The pleasure is all mine
More drinks and more food! More substances, more everything! You keep on consuming, enjoying the blissful pleasure, just as the Prince of Pleasure intended.
This is true excess
The way you can finally twist the warp around you, using the ruinous powers and understanding them. All that learning and studying finally payed of.
I am one with the warp

If you move the piece this way, you out flank your opponent, leading to full out manouvering and victory. Now if only this was just a chessboard, ohh how the real life can be manouvered, with people being the pieces on a board.
Everyone is a piece on a board, just have to move them
Ohh my, ohh my, the information you learned to gather, the plots you discovered and started. Everything is going according to plan! You play by the great plan, all for the Changer of ways.
Just as planned!

Line moved to the left, another to the right and the enemy is surrounded. Just ready to be slaughtered. Amazing how much skill and dedication it takes to be a strategist, a leader that can lead all those armies across so many fields.
For maximum carnage, let the blood flow!
Strength, endurance, skill, constant training to embetter yourself. Slowly you are becoming unmatched in your combat skill, your dueling pleasing the Blood God.
I am a duelist, fight me!
Tracking your prey for days, hunting down largest of beasts and on top of all hunting down throphys for Khorne. You have proven over and over that you have became a mighty hunter.
The rush of the hunt pleases Khorne
It has been noticed that you havent been focusing yourself to those who are closest to you. That makes the great Papa sad. Family comes firsty and we wish that you accept that!

Distributing and gifting the gifts of Nurgle take a lot dedication. It isn't just being part of following, you have to spread the disease, work for embetterment of all! You have to focus on the plague business.
Now you will have more time to spend with those who are closest to you and deserving of your care. You make Nurgle proud!
It is my duty to stand with my family
Focusing on brewing and distributing the plague will help the cause, many more people will understand the gifts Great Unclean one has to offer. All thanks to your business models.
It is my honor to be spreading gifts!
You lack of excessing in flesh is disturbing. You should please the Dark Prince, yourself and others! Focus on seducing others, rock their nights, and make sure you had your own fun.

Have you gotten sick of hanging out of people? That is good, that means you need to focus even harder on it, the new excess it will bring to you will be pleasing for Slaanesh. Focus on carousing, it has been a while since you went out.
Now the amount of time you invest is how much pleasure you will find. You will only find excess if you go overtime sweetie, make your targets!
The pleasure is all mine
Finally, drinking and feasting, going out with your fellow friends. This is the true way to feel pleasure, pleasure of a keg and pleasure of friendship!
Pour me another one

Changer of Ways isn't jut about plotting and playing game of regicide. It is about knowledge, and knowledge is power. Focus on scholarship to learn new ways of how ruinous powers manifest and work in mortal realm.
It is time to focus on your intrigue, too much time you are wasting with pitiful games. It is time to gather information, plot and execute well constructed plans.
Knowledge is power and forbidden knowledge is even more power! Who would thought that books and scrolls can bring so much power.
I am englighted
Ahh yes, with these new informations, you can blackmail the pawns... or you can extort them for even more information! Scheming is the way to power.
I am the spider in middle of the web
Do not forget that Khorne respects war the most. You should be focusing on it, waging it and creating more carnage. It does not matter who, where or what, all that matters is that blood flows.
There are throphies and skulls lacking in your collection, do you even pay respects to the Blood God? Focus on hunting and slaughtering your prey in name of Khorne!
The slaughter, battles won and lost. It does not matter who is bleeding, it only matter that blood flows.
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD
Another beast slayed, another skull taken for Khorne. Your collection will slowly grow, keep hunting.
SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE
War is inevitable, chaos demands the change and stagnation, war brings both. You should focus yourself on war and bring new glories to Chaos!
Proving yourself over and over is the key to power, what best way than leadership? Leading schemes, plots, men, soldiers, realms, all in glory of Chaos. Focus on rulership to aid the cause.
Battle is the place to prove your worth and even if you fail, you have perished in service of Chaos. And there is no more glorious death!
For the ruinous powers!
Leadership is one of the most demanding works in existance and only those born for it are meant to take its responsibilities. Be a great man in service of grand Chaos.
I will lead my realm to glory
It is time to prove your mettle against another brother. Draw blood, whos doesn't matter, as Khorne demands it!
column14: x#society quest - duel a cult member

column2: It is time to prove your mettle against me. Draw your weapon and face me in a duel!
column14: x#society quest - duel the grand enchanter

column2: It is time to prove your mettle against another brother, take his skulls or have your skull be taken. Fight to death as Khorne demands it!
column14: x#society quest - duel a cult member to death

column2: It is time to reach new pleasures, this target is suitable for trying new and exciting things! Seducing them will bring pleasure to you and the Dark Prince.
Choose a Cultist Aspect
You should spend your free time on activities that pleases the Dark Gods
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait, in order to choose a activites at pleases the Dark Gods.
Is not choosing a Cultist Aspect
Does not have a Cultist Aspect
Has a Cultist Aspect
Is a Chaos Champion
Is a Chaos Chosen
Is a Chaos Daemon Prince

column1: ###QUEST###Fallback is the text on top like Change Focus to Family#desc is... the desc of the quest#tooltip is the text that pop up when you hover over the ? It describes what you need to do to complete it like §click§ on the focus and change it to X

Duel for honor
Duel for honor
Members of Warbands often spar with one another, for practice and recreation. It is not a duty one neglects without the notice of one's peers.
Select a fellow member of your secret society and in diplomacy with the target, pick the option Duel
Duel to the death
Duel to the death
It is important to occasionally test one's mettle and prove oneself as a warrior. A straight-forward way is to seek out enemies and deal with them, personally.
Select a fellow member of your secret society and in diplomacy with the target, pick the option duel. Duel him to death or die trying!
Seduce target
Seduce target
It is time to reach new pleasures. This target is suitable for trying new and exciting things! Seducing them will bring pleasure to you and the Dark Prince.
Select the target and in diplomacy with the target, select the option Seduce
